# polytomic_cloudflare_logs_connection (Data Source)

Cloudflare Logs Connection

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "polytomic_cloudflare_logs_connection" "cloudflare_logs" {
  id = "aab123aa-27f3-abc1-9999-abcde123a4aa"
}
```
